name: ContentLock
author: Adam Solymosi

sections.description:
ContentLock is a simple solution to set email based access to your Pages, Posts or Custom Post Types.

Do you want to provide quick access to someone (or a whole group) via email only, without requiring any kind of registration?

Here is your plugin!

ContentLock offers a solution that is independent of WordPress users and the registration system, allowing you to grant access to content that is hidden from other visitors.

Compatible with popular editors and plugins: Gutenberg, Classic Editor, Elementor, Divi, etc.
sections.installation:
Upload/Download the ContentLock plugin to your site, activate it, and click on the new menu item “ContentLock.” Then follow the helper instructions.
Make sure your email system is functioning correctly on your site, or verify that your SMTP settings are properly configured.

1.0.2

  • Initial release.

short_description: Secure access to your content (Pages, Posts, or Custom Post Types) with ContentLock's email-based two-step verification!
